name: Blackout (Fazer1929)
description:
You're on a mission to free your friends(AgAiN).

Nobody can stop you this time(MaYbE)

Its a Short game , if you can complete it. 

If you like this game consider donating.

CONTROLS-

Arrow Keys - For Movement

Space bar - For Attack 

Escape - Pause

Credits-

Audio-  opengameart (They do have some awesome assets)
